snippet: The plea by Ry-Ann Hermon, Assemblyman William F. Boyland Jr.’s former chief of staff, may lead to new evidence against Mr. Boyland.
abstract: Ry-Ann Hermon, former chief of staff for Assemblyman William F Boyland Jr of Brooklyn, is scheduled to plead guilty to playing role in bribery scheme, as part of agreement with government that could produce new evidence against Boyland in the federal case against him.
lead_paragraph: The plea by Ry-Ann Hermon, Assemblyman William F. Boyland Jr.’s former chief of staff, may lead to new evidence against Mr. Boyland.

headline.seo: Boyland’s Ex-Aide Expected to Plead Guilty to Bribery
headline.main: Assemblyman’s Ex-Aide Is Said to Plan Guilty Plea
headline.print_headline: Assemblyman’s Ex-Aide Is Said to Plan Guilty Plea
